Ministries and the Houston Faith Church
family praise the lord well tonight
we're going to give a a recap of our

know uh what what went on while we were
there we were in the Philippines so our
trip this year was to Elo Elo city in

places we were there a very fruitful

and uh you know I don't think anyone

this year just I want to just say a

uh we we beat our largest team before by

we all came uh we all went we all came
back praise the
Lord uh we all we all went friends and
we all came back friends praise the Lord
there's something to be said for that on

but it was very close to our Island and
so 27 flights were cancelled uh when we

Rejoice out loud and so all 21 of us
just started rejoicing very loudly in

the Lord and we kind of saw a
breakthrough at that point so praise God
for the power of rejoicing uh but we do
appreciate all of your prayers I know
that um they were effective and they
helped us a lot so here are some of the
the things that we did while we were
there we had structured outreaches which
is where they go out into a particular
community and they spend a lot of work
Gathering people together and there we
do what I call freestyle Ministry where
we just get up we're we're sharing kind
of as it comes from the Lord about uh
we're presenting salvation we're
presenting baptism of the Holy Spirit
we're presenting all kinds of things the
love of God how how the word of God can
change your life and so uh one of the

the day when we were having such an
Outreach and all of the uh all of the
team members most of the team members
were coming up one by one and sharing
various testimonies of of what God had
done in their life and just the impact
of that wow and then we would feed them
uh of course make sure food is a big
deal there so uh we had three structured
outreaches while we were there in
various uh cities or various parts of
the city uh we had three pointed times
of Street evangelism uh one time we went
out into a certain section of the city
broke up into our teams another time we
were out in a park uh covered the whole
Park area and then another time we were
out in a mall uh just sharing these are
oneon-one times of course all of our
travel time I think before we even got
there we had already won 20 people to
the Lord because everywhere we go we are
sharing uh Christ uh so it's travel time
and of course every restaurant just at
all times we're sharing the Lord but we
had three times of pointed uh Street
evangelism we had uh two night
conferences uh meetings where that were
for believers we had a pastor and
leaders conference uh that was an all
day conference about 7 hours uh we did
four church services while we were there
uh overall we reached uh
3,346 people uh we preached to
ministered to talked to in some form or
fashion and all through all those events
uh that's 200
2,782 people in the events and then 564

outreaches but we had
